skill.author: Cygnusfear

security_audit.summary: The create-plan skill is purely documentation-based with no executable code. It contains legitimate software development planning templates and guidelines with no security risks.

content.user_title: Generate Implementation Plans for Development Tasks
content.value_statement: Stop wasting time figuring out how to structure complex development work. This skill creates detailed implementation plans that guide you step-by-step through feature development, refactoring, or bug fixes.
actual_capabilities: Creates structured implementation plans in .plans directory
Provides templates for features, refactors, and bug fixes
Maps every requirement to implementation steps
limitations: Requires existing codebase analysis for accurate plans
Cannot execute code or modify files directly
Plans must be manually implemented by developers
Depends on quality of input requirements

use_cases.title: Plan Complex Refactoring Projects
use_cases.description: Break down large-scale refactoring into manageable steps with clear dependencies and validation checkpoints.

use_cases.title: Create Feature Implementation Roadmaps
use_cases.description: Generate comprehensive plans for new features that account for all requirements and edge cases.

use_cases.title: Structure Bug Fix Work
use_cases.description: Get step-by-step guidance for fixing bugs with proper testing and validation steps.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Feature Plan
prompt_templates.scenario: Adding a new user authentication system
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an implementation plan for adding JWT-based authentication to our Node.js API. Users should be able to register, login, and access protected routes.

prompt_templates.title: Refactoring Plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Plan the refactoring of our monolithic Express app into a modular architecture with separate controllers, services, and data layers.

prompt_templates.title: Bug Fix Plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a plan to fix the memory leak in our WebSocket connection handler that's causing server crashes every 6 hours.

prompt_templates.title: Complex Integration
prompt_templates.prompt: Design an implementation plan for integrating our payment system with Stripe, including webhook handling, error recovery, and database transactions.

output_examples.input: Create a plan to add dark mode toggle to our React application
output: - Extract all dark mode requirements from issue #234
- Audit existing theme system in src/styles/
2. Implement useTheme hook with system preference detection
3. Create dark theme variables in src/styles/themes/
5. Update all components to use theme-aware styling
- Test theme persistence across page reloads

best_practices: Always extract and verify all requirements before creating the plan
Use the appropriate template (feature/refactor/fix) for your task type
Review existing CLAUDE.md files to ensure compliance with project standards
anti_patterns: Creating plans without auditing the existing codebase first
Using migration strategies or gradual rollouts (explicitly forbidden)
Including temporary code or fallback mechanisms in plans

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with all project types?
faq.answer: Yes, it works with any codebase but requires existing project structure analysis for best results.

faq.question: What are the size limits for implementation plans?
faq.answer: Plans can handle projects of any size, but very large projects should be broken into smaller phases.

faq.question: Can I integrate these plans with my project management tools?
faq.answer: Plans are saved as markdown files in .plans directory, easily convertible to other formats.

faq.question: How does the skill ensure data safety?
faq.answer: The skill only reads and creates documentation files, never modifying your actual code.

faq.question: What if the plan doesn't match my requirements?
faq.answer: The skill validates against original requirements - simply provide more specific details in your request.

faq.question: How does this compare to manual planning?
faq.answer: It provides structured, comprehensive plans following best practices while saving significant time.
